# v-carousel



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute       | Description                                                                                                                                      | Type          | Default       |
| --------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------- | ------------- |
| `pagesize`      | `pagesize`      | The number of elements to show per page view. Defaults to 3                                                                                      | `number`      | `3`           |
| `sectionTitle`  | `section-title` | Section title to use in heading                                                                                                                  | `"Carousel!"` | `"Carousel!"` |
| `watchchildren` | `watchchildren` | If defined/true, sets a mutation observer to reinitialize the component when child nodes are changed.  Otherwise ignores changes to child nodes. | `boolean`     | `false`       |
